alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 7:53PM MST until February 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible on southwest and west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and deteriorate rapidly under snow squalls. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
